channel.title: Members/donators/subscriber's only world?
channel.description: How do I make it like only a player with donator = 1 can login to a server? i am planning to make a F2P world and a P2P world. If you could tell me how to make worlds transfer stuff i would be thankful. Hope some1 can help soon :)

item.title: Members/donators/subscriber's only world?
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]If you’re referring to P2P as Pay to Play, then you’ll have to make a variable, let’s say “Member”

You’ll have to declare the variable correctly, then add a method in the log in void, saying only “Member = 1” can log in (“Member = 0” would be f2p)[/quote]

Yea, but is the log in void in my client . java?

Read full topic

item.title: Members/donators/subscriber's only world?
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Not really…
That’s why MySQL is used…[/quote]

K but i still wonder, how do i make a server P2P? Whee is my login method? What do i add there? Does it work for my delta source?

Read full topic

item.title: Members/donators/subscriber's only world?
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]A hubserver is a server that stores all the data from both/all servers.

It’s a lot easier to use than MySQL; though, you’d have to write your own hubserver.[/quote]
Okay, cool. But how do i make a hubserver and how do i use it? Do you know about any guide that might help me?
And yea, u think members world are stupid, but… I wanna make 2 worlds 1 f2P and 1 P2P. If you can help please do so, even thou u think its stupid, and anyways, if u can help, please explain where i can find my login method and all that… I ould be really grateful ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Members/donators/subscriber's only world?
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:3, topic:343638”]in your login method do

if (donator != 1) { return false; } else { //login method here }[/quote]

Do i add that over my login method? And btw, where can i find it? I am new at this =P

Read full topic

item.title: Members/donators/subscriber's only world?
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Donor only world = stupid.

To transfer, make a hubserver, or integrate with mysql[/quote]
i have no idea what a “hubserver” is but. Mysql intergration. Create a forum and make it so they have to register to log into the server and a set rights in the sql.

Read full topic
